name: Sunyata Flower
title: Sunyata Flower
desc: "This vibrant color is the miracle of life's flowing springs."\n"Abide with me, sing and caper with me, and let us weave eternal joy"...

skills.desc:
Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.
During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
